**LEPT Heavy Mk I**

Zero load delta-v - 6902m/s

Max load (300 tonnes rated) delta-v - 3523m/s

Objective - LKO

Part count - 107

Tested payload - 300t

Max theoretical payload - 420t

[Subassembly](http://kerbalx.com/leptoon/LEPT-Heavy-Mk-I-Subassembly)

**LEPT Heavy Mk II**

Objective - LKO

Part count - 109

Tested payload - 200t

I'll be updating this thread with additions to the family periodically. Thank you for downloading.
